ComicInfo.Summary:
Katie and her comic shop gang continue their first team Vampblade mission at SoCal Comic Con, but things aren’t going as planned. Instead of them finding the local vamp hub, they find the vamps turning the convention floor itself into an other-dimensional death trap!
Features 3 covers (regular, artist, and 90s style), each with a risqué variant as well!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marco Maccagni | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 4 | E | 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Pow Rodrix | 5 | F | Risqué 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Pow Rodrix | 6 | Note: Overall issue #16.

ComicInfo.Title: Part Three
